text: Fase 1 completa: Sistema unificado de conhecimento implementado com KnowledgeTracker

Commit 3a73df9: feat(knowledge): implement unified knowledge system with Graphiti integration

- Add KnowledgeTracker service (lib/knowledge/)
  - types.ts: TypeScript interfaces for episodes, search, metadata
  - tracker.ts: Main tracker class with Graphiti + fallback support
  - index.ts: Re-exports

- Add API routes (/api/knowledge/)
  - search: Semantic search in knowledge graph
  - track: Record knowledge episodes
  - health: Check Graphiti and fallback status

- Add automation scripts (scripts/knowledge/)
  - index-session.ts: Index development sessions
  - track-commit.ts: Auto-track git commits

- Add git hook (scripts/hooks/post-commit)
  - Automatically tracks commits in knowledge graph

- Create CONHECIMENTO agent (.agent/workflows/)
  - Manages knowledge graph operations
  - Documents usage patterns

- Update all 14 agents with knowledge integration
  - Add 'üß† Integra√ß√£o com Conhecimento' section
  - Add @collaborates: CONHECIMENTO
  - Update @last-verified to 2025-12-30

- Update _DNA.md with knowledge section
  - Base principles inherited by all agents

- Update manutencao.md
  - Add Phase 5: Graphiti sync
  - Add knowledge metrics to health checks

- Update _INDEX.md with CONHECIMENTO agent

Commit 0b3b93e: fix(agents): standardize ecosystem and fix inconsistencies

- Remove duplicate CONHECIMENTO.md (keep CONHECIMENTO-agent.md)
- Remove Feedback/.obsidian (replaced by Graphiti workflow)
- Fix 28 broken references: NOME.md ‚Üí NOME-agent.md
  - ANALISTA, CODIGO, CONSISTENCIA, CONTEUDO, DADOS
  - DESIGN, ESTRUTURA, GITHUB, IDEIAS, SEGURANCA
  - TOKEN, VALOR

- Add missing frontmatter fields:
  - CONHECIMENTO: escalates-to, collaborates, @receives-from
  - DATABASE: type, name, role, trigger, inherits, escalates-to

- Update _INDEX.md hierarchy diagram:
  - Add CONHECIMENTO as central memory layer
  - Add DATABASE and MANUTENCAO as infrastructure

Commit ef70bb4: feat(manutencao): upgrade to v2.0 with critical observation mindset

- Add 'Mentalidade Cr√≠tica' section with probing questions
- Add Phase 5: Propostas de Melhoria (improvement proposals)
- Add Dashboard de Sa√∫de for quick status overview
- Add automated health check script template
- Expand checklist to include improvement requirements
- Add 'Propostas de melhoria' metric (at least 1 required)
- Update escalation paths to include CONHECIMENTO
- Version bump: 1.0.0 ‚Üí 2.0.0

Philosophy shift: from passive verification to active improvement

Commit 9c3e5de: feat(agents): implement autonomous agent system with Antigravity integration

- Add ROUTER-agent.md as meta-orchestrator for automatic intent classification
- Add CLAUDE.md and AGENTS.md with mandatory auto-invocation protocol
- Add /chaos and /sessao workflows for Graphiti integration
- Add ~/.gemini/GEMINI.md as global system prompt for Antigravity
- Add .agent/rules/ for project-specific rules
- Update _INDEX.md v3.0 with ROUTER as first priority
- Add tags/aliases to 13 agents for Obsidian compatibility
- Add Kanban visual to BACKLOG.md
- Add Obsidian/ and Agents/ to .gitignore

Implements revolutionary 'living agents' system where AI automatically:
- Classifies user intent
- Loads specialized agent context
- Consults Graphiti for historical context
- Documents decisions automatically

Commit 5ffc83d: fix(agents): add response format to _INDEX.md for better visibility

The GEMINI.md in ~/.gemini/ may not be read by all AI models.
Adding the mandatory response format directly to _INDEX.md where
all AIs will definitely see it when reading project context.

Commit 6d44ad9: docs(manutencao): v3.0 - add Antigravity configuration section

- Add GEMINI.md check to Dashboard de Sa√∫de
- Add new section 'ü§ñ Configura√ß√£o Antigravity (CR√çTICO)'
- Document correct path: ~/.homebox/dev-ubuntu/.gemini/GEMINI.md
- Add sync verification and troubleshooting commands
- Add /chaos and /sessao to workflow-links
- Update version notes

Key discovery: The GEMINI.md path inside distrobox is different
from standard ~/.gemini/ path.
